tasks.label: Build and Deploy ForceMute
tasks.command: $env:JAVA_HOME = "$env:ProgramFiles\Microsoft\jdk-17.0.18.8-hotspot"; $env:ANDROID_HOME = "$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Android\Sdk"; .\gradlew.bat assembleDebug --rerun-tasks; Copy-Item app\build\outputs\apk\debug\app-debug.apk ForceMute.apk -Force; & "$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Android\Sdk\platform-tools\adb.exe" -s 192.168.4.241:35609 install -r ForceMute.apk; & "$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Android\Sdk\platform-tools\adb.exe" -s 192.168.4.241:35609 shell pm grant com.forcemute.app android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
